title: 112_s552
content: Emergency Deficit Reduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) impose an additional 5.4 tax on individual taxpayers whose modified adjusted gross income exceeds $1 million. (2) repeal the amortization of intangible and drilling and development costs for oil, gas, and geothermal wells. (3) repeal the percentage depletion allowance for oil and gas wells. And (4) deny a tax deduction for income attributable to the domestic production of oil, natural gas, or primary products thereof.
